translation.luo: Ka jotelo ywayore e kindgi, weche ok bi dhi maber e kidienje duto mag riwruokno, moriwo nyaka weche pesa, kod chuny ma jotich bedogo. Kendo tich ok bi tire maber.

translation.en: Once your business’ productivity starts to suffer, failure is sure to follow.
translation.luo: Sama tich ok tire maber, bed gadier ni ohandino podho.

translation.en: If you are not confident about your leadership skills, don’t panic.
translation.luo: Kapo ni ineno ni ok ing'eyo tayo ji e yo maber, kik chunyi tho.

translation.en: You can develop the skills needed through engaging the right mentors, enrolling for business leadership training, and conducting research on how successful business leaders have handled similar situations.
translation.luo: Inyalo yudo lony madwarore kitudori gi joma osetimo maber e ohala kendo moikore puonji, inyalo kawo kos matiego ji e wach tayo ji kaka ja ohala, bende inyalo timo nonro mondo ine kaka joma osetelo e yo maber mi ohandgi odhi maber ne otimo nade sama ne giromo gi pek kaka miromogo sani.

translation.en: Unprofitable business model
translation.luo: Bedo gi chenro ma ok kel ohala

translation.en: You might have a good business idea, and all the best intentions and determination to succeed, but if you have an unprofitable business model, you won’t have a sustainable revenue stream.
translation.luo: Nyalo bet ni ohala midwaro chako en ohala maber, kendo iketo chunyi duto e ohandino kendo idwaro timo kinda mondo odhi maber. Kata kamano, ka chenro ma in-go ok en makelo ohala mikwano, ok ibi yudo pesa machwaloni ohandino.

translation.en: An unprofitable business model might mean that you either break even or make losses
translation.luo: Ka chenroni ok kel pesa, ibiro yudo ni iloko ohala to onge gima iyudo, to ka ok kamano, idhi asara.

translation.en: There are many reasons that can make your business unprofitable including setting your prices too low, too much overhead costs, failure to optimise conversions, and poor customer retention.
translation.luo: Nitie gik mang'eny manyalo miyo ohandi kik dhi maber. Nyalo bedo ni iketo nengo mapiny ahinya, itiyo gi pesa mang'eny ahinya e siro ohandi, joma biro neno giki ok ng'iep, kata kastembe ok sik kodi.

translation.en: When setting up your business model, think about building an effective sales funnel that maximises conversions and helps in customer retention.
translation.luo: Sama iloso chenro mar timo ohala, ket e paro kaka inyalo bero wach uso. Tem ywayo kastembe mochopo mondo ging'iep kendo ne ni itimo gik madwarore mondo kastembe osik kodi.

translation.en: Building a sales funnel requires you to consider your target audience, set up a system to analyse their behaviour, come up with a strategy to capture their attention, and create nurturing campaigns to maintain your connection.
translation.luo: Mano dwaro ni ing'e maber joma idwaro usonegi, bed gi chenro mibiroga tiyogo mondo inon kaka  kastembe ng'iepoga, bed gi chenro mar ywayogi, kendo kinde ka kinde tim gik mamorogi mabiro miyo gisik kodi.

translation.en: Poor financial management
translation.luo: Tiyo gi pesa e yo ma ok owinjore

translation.en: One of the leading causes of small business failure is poor financial management. In fact, 82 per cent of business failure is rooted in poor cash management, according to a US bank study.
translation.luo: Achiel kuom gik mamiyo ohendni matindo podho en ni gitiyo gi pesa e yo ma ok owinjore. Kaluwore gi nonro moro ma ne otim kuom bengi Amerka, pasent 82 mar ohendni mapodho, podho nikech ne ok gitiyo gi pesa maber.

translation.en: Poor financial management can have you lock up a large sum of your business capital in fixed assets, which might lead to cash flow problems later on. For your business operations to run smoothly, you need to have enough money as working capital.
translation.luo: Ka ok itiyo gi pesa maber inyalo yudo ni itiyo gi pes ohala mang'eny e ng'iewo mwandu. Pesago koro odinne ma ok inyal tiyogo, kendo mano nyalo miyo  ibed gi pesa manok ma ok rom timo ohala. Mondo ohandi odhi maber, dwarore ni ibed gi pesa moromo masiro ohala mapile.

translation.en: Other than bad cash flow management, financial management woes come from poor budgeting and bookkeeping, insufficient tax preparation, and failing to seek professional advice when needed.
translation.luo: Mopogore gi pesa bedo manok, chandruoge mag pesa bedoga ka ok olos bajet maber, ok okan rekod maber mar pesa madonjo kod mawuok, ok ochul osuru kaka dwarore kata ng'ato ok okwayo kony mar jokwano kinde ma owinjore ni otim kamano.

translation.en: Understandably, most people going into business don’t have the accounting skills required to manage a business’ cash flow, taxes, expenses, and other financial issues.
translation.luo: Ok kaw ng'ato gi wuoro ni ng'eny joma chako ohala onge gi lony modok korka wach timo kwano manyisogi kaka ohala dhi gadier, kaka pesa wuotho, kaka owinjore ochul osuru , kwan pesa duto mawuok oko, kod weche mamoko mag pesa.

translation.en: But to have a successful business, you have to know where every penny comes from, where it goes, and how it is helping your business achieve its goals.
translation.luo: Mondo ohandi odhi maber, nyaka ing'e kama siling moro amora owuokie kod kama odhie kendo kaka silingno konyo ohandi.

translation.en: This is why it is important to pay for professional accounting services.
translation.luo: Mano ema omiyo dwarore ni ichul joma olony e kwano mar ohala mondo okonyi.

translation.en: If you are really strapped for cash, you can also manage your own finances through professional business accounting software – remember to log in all the financial transactions to generate accurate financial statements.
translation.luo: Ka pesani tin, kendo ok inyal chulo ng'ato, inyalo timo kwan mar ohandi kendi kitiyo gi gik mitimoe kwan mag ohala mayudore e intanet. – ne ni indiko pesa duto  modonjo kata mowuok mondo ing'e kaka ohandi dhi gadier.

translation.en: Job searching can be very time-consuming and exhausting. It is a journey that may take days or even months depending on the jobs available.
translation.luo: Manyo tich en gima nyalo kawo thuolo mang'eny ahinya kendo nyalo miyo ng'ato ool mokalo. Onyalo kawi ndalo mogwaro, kata mana dweche kaluwore gi tije mantie.

translation.en: The following steps will guide you on your job search journey.
translation.luo: Okengegi nyalo konyi sama imanyo tich.

translation.en: A successful job search depends on your preparation.
translation.luo: Mondo imany tich miyud tich, dwarore ni iikri motelo.

translation.en: Therefore, pulling together everything needed for the search is important. The most successful applications are the ones that are tailored to specific roles.
translation.luo: Omiyo dwarore ni ichok kanyachiel gik moko duto mibiro dwaro sama imenyo. Barupe mag kwayo tich matiyo maber gin modimbo maler tije sie minyalo timo.

translation.en: It is, therefore, important to take time and identify what you are looking for and the nature of the prospective employer; media, manufacturing, NGO, parastatal?
translation.luo: Onego ikaw kinde mondo ing'e tich mane sie ma imanyo kod kit kambi kata riwruok ma dipo ka ondiki, dibed  ni en riwruok mar jofwamb weche mag redio kata televison? Dibed ni en kambi maloso gik moko, dibed ni en riwruok ma ok mar sirkal? Koso dobed riwruok ma sirkal oriwo kod kambi machielo?

translation.en: Create impressive job search documents to support you in your journey.
translation.luo: Ndik barupe mabeyo mag kwayo tich mabiro konyi sama imenyo.

translation.en: The CV should impress your potential employer and the applicant tracking system.
translation.luo: Barupi mar manyo tich kata CV onego oywa wang' joma onego ondiki tich kendo obed gi weche manyalo miyo oywaye gi chenro mitiyogo e intanet e manyo jotich.

translation.en: Update your CV to cover your achievements and the type of roles you want.
translation.luo: Ne ni CV mari wacho weche manyasani kuomi, moriwo gik misetimo kod kit tich midwaro.

translation.en: Identify a minimum of three referees to include in your CV.
translation.luo: Ne ni ka tin, ichiwo nonro mar ji adek minyalo wuogo mondo gisir weche miwacho kendo giwach kaka iwinjori gi tich midwarono.

translation.en: Create a LinkedIn profile since most employers use this platform to know about a potential candidate.
translation.luo: Ne ni iketo nonroni e  LinkedIn ma en chenro mar intanet ma ji ketoe nonrogi mondo giyud tich. Ng'eny joma manyo jotich manyo nonro mag joma gidwaro ndiko tich kuno.

translation.en: Write a cover letter that focuses on why you are the best fit for the role advertised.
translation.luo: Ndik weche moko matin manyiso gimomiyo in ema iwinjori chuth gi tich mikwayono.

translation.en: You should also state your achievements which will set you apart from the other applicants.
translation.luo: Bende, onego indik gik misetimo mamiyo iwinjori gi tijno moloyo joma moko mokwayo tijno.

translation.en: Identify job adverts that fit your role requirements.
translation.luo: Many tije mowinjore gi lony ma in-go.

translation.en: Then make sure you meet most of the requirements before applying.
translation.luo: Kapok ikwayo tich moro amora, ne ni ichopo ng'eny gik ma gidwaro.

translation.en: Align your CV with the requirements of the job advert.
translation.luo: Tim lokruok e CV mari mondo owinjre gi tich mikwayono.

translation.en: Don’t just sit around after a single application.
translation.luo: Kik ibed abeda bang' oro barua achiel.

translation.en: Keep on applying for jobs that fit your role requirement.
translation.luo: Dhi nyime kwayo tije maluwore gi gik minyalo timo.

translation.en: You can always follow up with the organization if you don’t receive a response after two weeks.
translation.luo: Ka jumbe ariyo okalo to ok iyudo dwoko, inyalo wuoyo gi joma ikwayo tichgo.

translation.en: As you search for jobs, it is important to network.
translation.luo: Sama imanyo tich nyis osiepeni, jotich wadu, joodu kata joma itudrigo e intanet ni imenyo.

translation.en: Let your friends, colleagues, family and social media contacts know that you are open to new opportunities.
translation.luo: Mano nyalo konyi ahinya e yudo tich.

translation.en: Attend career fairs and talks since most prospective employers are always watching.
translation.luo: Dhi e chokruoge migoloe twege e wi weche mag tich. Ng'eny joma manyo jotich manyoga jotich kuondego.

translation.en: Hopefully, your previous steps have been successful and a job is around the corner.
translation.luo: Wageno ni okenge misekawo biro miyo iyud tich machiegnini.

translation.en: Prepare well for your interview.
translation.luo: Ikri ne penjo mibiro penji.

translation.en: Ensure your clothing is in sync with the dress code of the organization.
translation.luo: Ne ni irwakori e yo maluwore gi chik mar riwruogno.

translation.en: Know your CV inside out and have some questions to ask the panelists during the interview.
translation.luo: Lony gi weche duto mindiko e CV mari, kendo iik penjo mibiro penjo joma biro wuoyo kodi.

translation.en: Once you have received the job offer, do some research on what they offer for similar roles and be clear on what you will and will not accept.
translation.luo: Ka omiyi tich, tim nonro motelo kaka ichulo joma moko matimo tich ma omiyono. Ng'ad motelo pesa mibiro yie ni ochuli kod ma ibiro tamori.

translation.en: The African Development Bank (AfDB) has blacklisted Kenyan firm Mactebac Contractors and its Director Joram Opala for three years over fraud in a Sh1 billion project.
translation.luo: Bengi mar African Development Bank (AfDB) oketo kambi ma Kenya ma Mactebac Contractors kod Jatende Joram Opala e list mar joma ok bi gen kuom higni adek nikech gin e kuo motudre gi  tich ma ne dhi kawo bilion 1.

translation.en: In a statement issued yesterday, AfDB Group said Mactebec Contractors and its affiliates will be barred from participating in projects financed by the lender as well as other banks until the firm and its director undergo an integrity compliance programme.
translation.luo: E ripot manyoro ogol,  AfDB Group wacho ni  Mactebec Contractors kod joma tiyo kode ibiro geng' mondo kik giti e tich moro amora mosir gi bengino kaachiel gi bengi mamoko nyaka chop kama onon kambino kod jatende  e chenro moro manono ka ng'ato en jadier kendo inyalo gene.

translation.en: “An investigation conducted by the Bank’s Office of Integrity and Anti-Corruption established that Mactebac Contractors Ltd and Opala engaged in fraudulent practices during a tender for the construction works for Malaba Water and Sanitation Project under the Kenya Towns Sustainable Water Supply and Sanitation Program in Kenya,” said AfDB in its statement.
translation.luo: AfDB ne owacho niya: “Nonro moro ma ne otim gi migawo mar bengino ma nono adiera mar ji kaachiel gi riwruok mar  Anti-Corruption, ne oyudo ni Mactebac Contractors Ltd kod Opala ne okwelo ka ne indiko tenda mar gero Malaba Water and Sanitation Project ma ne itimo e bwo chenro mar Kenya Towns Sustainable Water Supply and Sanitation Program in Kenya.”

translation.en: Joram Opala Otieno at the Milimani Anti-corruption Court in August 2020.
translation.luo: Joram Opala Otieno ka en  Milimani Anti-corruption Court Agost 2020.

translation.en: In 2019, the Rift Valley Water Works Development Agency, the project's implementing agency sought a contractor to build 22.5 kilometres of piping, a new water treatment plant, rehabilitation of an existing plant, staff houses and storage tanks.
translation.luo: E higa mar  2019,  Rift Valley Water Works Development Agency, ma ne en riwruok ma ne itiyogo e chenrono, ne omanyo kambi mochung' ne gedo mondo kambino oketnegi paip ma borne en kilomita 22.5, olosnegi kama ithiedhoe pi mondo obed maler, olos masin mitiyogo sani mabet okethore, ogernegi ute jotich kendo olosnegi tangi mikanoe pi.

translation.en: The project was meant to support the development of water supply infrastructure in 19 towns and sanitation infrastructure in 17 towns.
translation.luo: Chenrono ne onego okel dongruok e wach pi e taonde 19, kendo okony e weche cho e taonde 17.

translation.en: Last year, Opala, his brother and sister-in-law were charged alongside Migori Governor Okoth Obado and 12 others over graft in county contracts.
translation.luo: Higa mokalo, Opala, ore, gi yuore ne oter enyim doho kanyakla gi gavana ma Migori Okoth Obado gi jomoko 12 kaluore gi mibadhi mag orak mag kanti.

translation.en: At the expiry of the debarment, Mactebac Contractors will only be eligible to participate in bank group-financed projects by implementing an integrity compliance programme.
translation.luo: Egiko mar geng'o, joorak mag Mactebac biro mana bedo gi ratiro mar bedo jokanyo,e dongruok mag pes-grube mitayo gi bengi ka gi puodho chenro mag luwo ratiro.

translation.en: The firm and its affiliates will also be barred from participating in projects financed by the World Bank, Asian Development Bank and the American Development Bank.
translation.luo: Kambino kanyakla gi jowadgi bende ibiro tam e bedo jokanyo mag dongruok mitayo gi World Bank, Asian Development Bank gi American Development Bank.

translation.en: In February this year, AfDB banned Global Interjapan Kenya Ltd for engaging in fraud in a five-year Sh6.3 billion project.
translation.luo: Eyi due mar ariyo higani, bengi mar AfDB ne ochungo kambi mar Global Interjapan Kenya Ltd kuom tudruok gi mibadhi e dongruok mar higa-abich mar omenda mar billion 6.3.

translation.en: A company associated with politician Cyrus Jirongo has suffered a major setback after the Court of Appeal declined to freeze South Sudan government accounts over Sh5 billion dispute.
translation.luo: Kambi motudore gi jasiasa Cyrus Jirongo oyudo buok maduong bang Doho mar Apil dagi loro aguche mag piny owacho mar Sudan Mamilambo ewi  yuaruok mar omenda maromo billion 5.

translation.en: After the High Court lifted the orders barring the Salva Kiir-led Government from transferring the contested money from National Commercial Bank of Africa (NCBA) and Stanbic Bank, Jirongo’s firm, Yu Sung Construction Limited appealed hoping to reinstate the orders.
translation.luo: Bang doho mamalo golo chike mageng'o sirkal motelne gi Salva-Kiir  eloko omenda makelo yuaruok e bengi mar National Commercial Bank of Africa (NCBA) gi Stanbic Bank, kambi mar Jirongo,  Yu Sung Construction Limited chwalo yuakgi gi geno mar chiero chike.

translation.en: However, Court of Appeal judges Daniel Musinga, Patrick Kiage and Gatembu Kairu dismissed the application noting that Yu Sung had not proved that if the court rules in its favour, South Sudan is not capable of paying.
translation.luo: Kata kamano, jong'ad bura mag doho mar apil Daniel Musinga, Partrick Kiage gi Gatembu Kairu ne okuedo kwayo kagilero ni Yu Sung ne ok oyango mano, ponononi doho ong'ado bura manyakore, Sudan Mamilambo ok nyal chudo.

translation.en: “Will the intended appeal be rendered nugatory unless the orders sought are granted? We think not. The first respondent (South Sudan Attorney General) is the official representative of a sovereign State, which has an embassy in Kenya. It has not been alleged that if the appeal is successful the Republic of South Sudan shall be incapable of satisfying the decree that may be issued,” the judges ruled.
translation.luo: “Bende kwayo miparo biro bedo manono mana kaponono oyie chike mane ong'adi? Ok wapar kamano. Jaduoko mokuongo (jatend chike ma Sudan Mamilambo) en jachung mony'agre mar piny owacho, manitiere gi mbetre e piny Kenya.Pok osidhi ni kwayo odhikare to sirkal mar Sudan Mamilambo It has not been alleged that if the appeal is okbirobedo gi nyalo mar chopo duaro mar chik manyolo bet ni ochiu,” jang'ad bura neowacho.

translation.en: At the same time, the court observed that it is unclear whether the money held in the two banks in the name of The Bank of South Sudan is owned by the State or can be handed to a creditor in the event of a default.
translation.luo: Esechego go, doho ne oneno ni ok owinjore maler kaponi omenda mane omaki e bengi ariyo, e nying Bengi ma Sudan Mamilambo en mar piny owacho kata kanyalore chiune jahola ekinde machudo otamore.

translation.en: According to the judges, the bank is autonomous from the South Sudan government.
translation.luo: Kaluoregi jong'ad bura, bengi ni thuolo mar chung kende kopogore gi sirkal mar Sudan Mamilambo.

translation.en: “The end result is that this application is dismissed and the interim orders that we granted on March 16, 2021, are hereby vacated. The costs of the application shall be in the appeal,” they continued.
translation.luo: “Duoko mogik en ni kwayoni, okir oko, kendo chike mane wachiwo   tarik 16, due mar adek, koro gi sani okir oko. Nengo mar kwayo  biro yudore e yuak, negidhi nyime.

translation.en: The case stems from a decision given by the High Court.
translation.luo: Kesni osir kod ng'eto mar doho ma malo.

translation.en: Justice Joseph Sergon had initially directed that the Salva Kiir-led Government should not transfer the contested money from NCBA and Stanbic.
translation.luo: Jang'ad bura Joseph Sergon ne ochiko nyimekanyo ni sirkal motelne gi Salva Kiir kik lok omenda makelo yuaruokno koa NCBA gi Stanbic.

translation.en: Justice Sergon issued the orders four days after Justice Saidi Chitembwe lifted the orders which froze the two accounts.
translation.luo: Jang'ad bura Sergon ne ogolo chikno ndalo ang'wen bang Jang'ad bura Saidi Chitembwe golo chik mar gonyo thuolo  chungo akaunt ariyogo.

translation.en: According to Justice Sergon, the orders by Justice Chitembwe and Justice Jaden Thuranira appear to be conflicting with each other.
translation.luo: Kaluoregi jang'ad bura Sergon, chike jong'ad bura Chitembwe gi Jaden Thuranira nenore ka gima nitiere gi tungni.

translation.en: Justice Thuranira extended orders freezing South Sudan accounts to February 25, 2021.
translation.luo: Jang'ad bura Thuranira ne omendo ndalo mag chungo akaunde ma Sudan Mamilambo nyaka  tarik 25 due mar ariyo, 2021.

translation.en: “The matter be mentioned on February 25, 2021, before the presiding judge civil division for directions. The interim orders are hereby extended till February 25, 2021,” Justice Thuranira directed.
translation.luo: “Kesni ibiro luongi tarik 25, due mar ariyo higa mar 2021, enyim jang'ad bura mar civil divison mondo ochiuw yoo. Chike maleplep koro ochwal nyaka tarik 25, due mar ariyo 2021,” Jang'ad bura Thuranira neochiko.

translation.en: However, Justice Chitembwe in a separate ruling found that the orders in favour of Yu Sung had lapsed on February 10, 2021, adding that South Sudan was at liberty to operate its accounts.
translation.luo: Kata kamano, Justice Chitembwe e ng'ado bura machielo ne oyudo ni chike manyakor Yu Sung ne orumo tarik 10 due mar ariyo 2021, ka omedo ni Sudan Mamilambo nitiere gi thuolo mar tayo akaunt ge.

translation.en: “The second and third respondents (NCBA and Stanbic) having been served with the orders of February 10, 2021, should comply with those orders and allow the Government of South Sudan to operate its account freely,” Justice Chitembwe ruled on February 26.
translation.luo: “Bedo ni Joduoko mar ariyo gi adek (NCBA gi Stanbic) osemi ratiro mag chike ma tarik 10, due mar ariyo 2021,  onego gi luu ratirogo kendo yiene sirkal ma Sudan Mamilambo tiyo gi akauntgo githuolo,” Justice Chitembwe ne ong'ado tarik 26 due mar ariyo.

translation.en: He directed that the file be again placed before Justice Mbogholi Msagha who is the presiding judge and that the registry should forward any application filed by any party before March 4, 2021, to him to deal with it.
translation.luo: Ne ochiko ni mondo andika mag kesno oter enyim jang'ad bura Mbogholi Msagha ma biro winjogi kendo rejistra onego chwalne kwayo moro amora mokel gi jomoko kapok oromo tarik 4, due mar adek, 2021, mondo otiekrego.

translation.en: Aggrieved by Justice Chitembwe’s orders, Yu Sung filed another application on February 28, 2021, asking the court to suspend the same as it moved to the Court of Appeal.
translation.luo: Yu Sung ne otero kwayo moro tarik 28, due mar ariyo, 2021, bang neno ni chike ma jang'ad bura Chitembwe neok omore, kokwayo doho mondo ochung chikego kapod gi dhii e doho mar yuagruok.

translation.en: Justice Sergon agreed to give them 14 days and suspended Justice Chitembwe’s orders.
translation.luo: Jang'ad bura Sergon neoyie miyogi ndalo 14 kendo ne ochungo chike maneochiu gi jang'ad bura Chitembwe.

translation.en: In view of the facts that various judges have issued orders which appear to be in conflict, I think the court best placed to determine an application such as the one before this court is the Court of Appeal.
translation.luo: Kaluore gi kaka jong'ad buche ochiwo paro/chike macholo man gi tungni, aparoni doho mowinjore kao kwayo machalo makama en doho mar yuagruok.

translation.en: “An order for stay of execution of the order issued by Justice Chitembwe to last for 14 days pending filing a formal application seeking for a stay of execution pending appeal before Court of Appeal,” he ruled on March 2.
translation.luo: “Chik mar chungo dhi nyime gi chik mane ochiuw gi jang'ad bura Chitembwe mondo obedie kuom ndalo 14 karito tero kwayo mar rito chik mar chungo enyim doho mar yuagruok," ne ong'ado mano tarik 2 due mar adek.

translation.en: At the heart of the case is a deal to construct Dr John Garang memorial military academy and which Yusung is demanding for its pound of flesh from a consent signed before the East Africa Court of Justice(EACJ) while South Sudan claims that the firm never honored its end of the bargain and therefore should not be paid.
translation.luo: Echuny ywaruok nitiere winjruok mar gero kar puonjruok mar Dr John Garang memorial military academy kendo ma Yusung dwaro mondo omiye pokne kaluore gi ayie mane gi ndikre enyim doho mar East Africa Court of Justice(EACJ) ekinde gogo Sudan Mamilambo wacho ni kambino ne ok orito singo kendo ok onego chule.

translation.en: At the EACJ, Yusung had asked the court to force South Sudan pay USD 46 million (Sh 5.3 billion) which has accrued over time.
translation.luo: E EACJ, Yusung ne okwayo doho mondo ochun Sudan Mamilambo chulo dola milion 46 (omenda maromo bilion 5.3) ma osebedo kamedore ekinde malach.

translation.en: It also sought orders to force the country to export crude oil cargo which is equivalent to constructing the military academy and another one to construct Natinga Warehouses to a company in the United Emirates.
translation.luo: Bende ne omanyo chike machuno pinyno oro oko moo manengone romo gi gero kar puonjruok mar jolweny gi machielo mar gero Natinga Warehouse ne kambi moro eyi United Emirates.

translation.en: The proceeds, according to the company would be held in a joint account between South Sudan’s defense ministry and Appolo Advocates to ensure prompt payments.
translation.luo: Duoko, kaluore gi kambi onego obed e akaunt moriwo migao mar aritakue ma Sudan Mamilambo gi Appolo Advocates mar neno ni chudo otimore kaka owinjore.

translation.en: On November 26, 2020, they allegedly got into a deal to have the money paid in five instalments.
translation.luo: Tarik 26, due mar 11, 2020, wachore ni ne gidonje e winjoruok mane miyo gi chud tieng dibich.

translation.en: Yusung went to court, seeking to attach South Sudan accounts saying that it had learned Exim Bank had wired some USD 250 million (USD 27 billion).
translation.luo: Yusung ne odhi e doho kakwayo mondo oriu akaunts mar Sudan Mamilambo kagimedoni ne gifwenyoni Bengi mar Exim ne ooro dola moko milion 250 (dola bilion 27).

translation.en: Yusung’s director, Omeke, in his affidavit filed before the court argues that the consent recorded before the regional court cannot be contested.
translation.luo: Jatend Yusung, Omeke, eyi singruoge mane oter enyim doho ne owacho ni ayie mondiki enyim doho mar gwenge ok nyal loki.

translation.en: It flashed a disobedience flag to argue that South Sudan does not enjoy immunity.
translation.luo: En nyiso toktek wacho ni Sudan Mamilambo onge gi ng'uono eweche mag bura.

translation.en: “There is no immunity of any nature whatsoever that has been pleaded or established and none is available in relation to commercial transactions entered into by the state,” Omeke argues.
translation.luo: “Onge ng'uono moroamora mosekwa kata mosefweny kendo onge mayudore kochomore gi weche ohala ma sirkal timo," Omeke neomino dhoge.

translation.en: The President Salva Kiir Mayardit-led government in its reply to the case says that the case amounts to stealing from South Sudan’s citizens as the projects cited never barely started.
translation.luo: Sirkal mitayo gi Ker Salva Kiir Mayardit eduokone, wachoni kesni romre gi kuelo kuom jopiny Sudan Mamilambo nikech dongruogono bende pokne ochakore.

translation.en: It also asserts that the attached accounts are non-commercial and allowing Yusung to have the money would be equivalent to denying South Sudan citizens 3.12 per cent of their budget.
translation.luo: Kendo owachoni ni akaunt momakruokgodo ok gin mag uso kendo yiene Yusung bedo gi omenda biro chalo gi tamo jopiny Sudan Mamilambo atamalo 3.12 mar bagedgi.

translation.en: In its reply, the government claims that the orders by the court have grounded its operations, adding that it is aiding a money-laundering plot.
translation.luo: E duokone, sirkal wachoni chike mochiu gi doho osechungo tijene, kabende gi medo ni gikonyo kuo mar omenda.

translation.en: To support its case, it filed affidavits by a senior military officer Brigadier General Dau Duur, its first undersecretary, ministry of finance and planning Garang Majak Bol.
translation.luo: Eyor siro kesne, ne gi tero singruokgi (affidarvit) kokalo kuom apisa maduong mar lweny Brigadier General Dau Duur,  mokuongo e buojagoro, e migao mar omenda gi loch gwenge (finance and planning) Garang Majak Bol.

translation.en: Making sound decisions is a skill that paralyses.
translation.luo: Golo paro maliuw en rieko manyalo thiro.

translation.en: And for an entrepreneur, delays can be the difference between clinching a deal or sinking.
translation.luo: Kendo ne jaohala, lewo nyalo kelo pogruok e yuto kata lal.

translation.en: We talk to four business leaders who give some insights into the ‘dos and don’ts’ of the decision-making process.
translation.luo: Wawuoyo gi jotend ohala ang'wen mamiyowa weche maiye mag gik 'moyie gi mokoyie'  eyor golo paro.

translation.en: Slow decision-making is costly.
translation.luo: Ng'ado paro mamos kelo lal.

translation.en: Key matters affecting companies have big implications on business but the time to consider them and give a firm direction is usually short.
translation.luo: Weche mochuno mahinyo kembe ni duol maduong e hola makmana ni saa mar ng'iyogi gi chiwo yoo mowinjore luu chuok.

translation.en: The consequences of procrastination requires a lot of time and resources to correct.
translation.luo: Kum mar choro gik moko mbele dwaro seche mang'e kod duaro mang'eny mar loso.

translation.en: In addition, many decisions have implications to third parties who need timely information for them to plan.
translation.luo: Ewi mano, paro mang'ey nigi duol ne joma moko madwaro pango weche e wang saa.

translation.en: One of the best decisions we ever made was to invest and create our in-house building and construction subsidiary managed by qualified technical personnel.
translation.luo: Achiel kuom paro mabeyo mawasegang'ado en keto kendo kano gige gedo michung'ne gi jolony.

translation.en: This ensures quality control and reduces on overall construction costs
translation.luo: Maye kelo gedo bet e rang'iny mamalo kendo duoko chien lal.

translation.en: I highly regret a decision to have our growth and expansion business model based on large debt financing, easily accessible from banks.
translation.luo: Ayuago ahinya paro mar bedo gi dongruok gi yauruok mar ohala kokalo e gope madongo, mayudure mayot e bengi.

translation.en: This created a challenge in managing the debt.
translation.luo: Maye nekelo pek e tayo gope.

translation.en: My advice? Keep company debt levels to a minimum and base expansion on internally generated revenues, organic growth and savings.
translation.luo: Puonjna? Duok gope mag kambi piny kaka nyalore kendo ket dongruok gi omenda mayudore e uso mwandu kambi, dongruok manyaiye gi keno.

translation.en: Some senior company decision-makers shy away from making them because they want to avoid taking responsibility for risky or negative outcomes.
translation.luo: Jong'ad rieko madongo mag kembe moko nigi luoro mar ng'ado rieknigo nikech gi geng'o kao ting mag lal maok ochan.

translation.en: However, when you hold a position of responsibility in a company, one of the expectations of that office is timely decision making.
translation.luo: Kata kamano,ponono in gi ting' e kambi,achiel kuom maduarore e apis en ng'ado rieko e wang' saa.

translation.en: Before making an important decision, I do all the relevant consultation both internally and with external experts.
translation.luo: Kapok ang'ado rieko mowinjore, atimo penjo mowinjore ne jolony mayie gi maoko.

translation.en: This helps me understand the various scenarios or implications of the decision, both short term, medium-term and long term.
translation.luo: Mae konya e ng'eyo weche mapogoreopogore manyalo biro kod ng'ado rieko e seche machuok,mantire ediere kod mochwalore.

translation.en: Major decisions must be well informed to ensure you achieve the desired results and minimise potential risks or challenges.
translation.luo: Paro mongirore onego oyangi mondo ochopi ekelo duoko migombo kendo duoko lal moknyal geng' gi achiedh nade.

translation.en: Lee Karuri, executive chair of Resorts and Cities, a real estate development and hospitality company in Kenya.
translation.luo: Lee Karuri, en jakom maduong mar  Resorts and Cities, ma en kambi mar dongruok mag gero udi gi rueko mong'ere kaka real estate development and hospitality e Kenya.

translation.en: The best decision I ever made was getting into entrepreneurship at a young age.
translation.luo: Paro ber moloyo maneatimo en donjo e ohala kapod atin.

translation.en: By that one decision, I have created wealth, a decent livelihood, skills transfer and upgrading as well as a quality work experience for many.
translation.luo: Eparo achielno, aseloso mwandu, ngima maber, pogo gi medo rieko kod medo rang'iny mamalo e tich ne jok mang'eny.

translation.en: Procrastinating on decision-making is a vice.
translation.luo: Chwalo paro nyime ok en gima owinjore.

translation.en: Everyone in authority needs to make quick decisions to shape the direction of the team.
translation.luo: Ng'ato ang'ata mantiere e telo onego ng'ad riekni mapiyopiyo mondo orie yore mag riuok.

translation.en: Procrastination means putting everyone else in limbo and is viewed negatively by subordinates who are inconvenienced and irritated by lack of clarity.
translation.luo: Chwalo paro nyime en jokmoko duto e mudho kendo miyo gineno marach e wenge jotich mapiny maichacho kod maokmor koso ler.

translation.en: Procrastination kills respect, diminishes esteem and strips your team of the confidence they have in you.
translation.luo: Chwalo paro nego luoro,duoko chiern nyadhi kendo gonyo riuruok chier magingo kuomi.

translation.en: Before making a decision, get all the facts you need.
translation.luo: Kapok ing'ado rieko,yud adiera tee miduaro.

translation.en: Then improve your understanding of the facts by talking to knowledgeable people or researching.
translation.luo: Ka aye to imed winjoni mar adiera go kiwuoyo kod jolony mamoko kata timo nonro.

translation.en: Also, observe the dynamics of the external environment.
translation.luo: Kendo,ng'i chal mar aluorani ma oko.

translation.en: Then make the best decision you can, all facts considered.
translation.luo: Ka aye to ing'ad bura maber minyalo,kaluolore gi adiera maingo.

translation.en: I don’t regret any decision I have made as it is from failure that we learn and grow from but I do wish I had decisively and intentionally ring-fenced personal time from the get-go.
translation.luo: Okayuagi ng'ado rieko moraamora masetimo kaka en koya e rem ema wapuonjore kendo wadongre en mana ni agombo ga ni dine aparo bedo gi thuolona awuon chakre sechego.

translation.en: If I was to do it all over again, I wouldn’t work all hours as I now know that quality relationships with oneself, family and friends should be prioritised.
translation.luo: Kaponi anyalo chako time kendo, ok anyal tiyo seche tee nikech koro ang'eyo ni ber keto nyime bedo e riuruok kod in iwuon,anyuola kod osiepe.

translation.en: Joanne Mwangi Yelbert is the founder and CEO of PMS Group Africa, an integrated marketing communications company.
translation.luo: Joanne Mwangi Yelbertemane ochako kendo en jatelo maduong' mar PMS Group Africa, kambi mar fwambo kod uso.

translation.en: People shy away from making decisions because of fear of making the wrong one.
translation.luo: Dhano oluoro ng'ado rieko nikech luoro mar ng'ado mokowinjore.

translation.en: It is however better to take a position and be wrong rather than sit it out and fail by default.
translation.luo: Kata kamano oloyo ing'ad rieko mokowinjore moloyo ling gi poni iluar. Ng'enyne wayuago ang'e e paro kata timbe ma warem etimo moloyo mago ma watimo, bang'e wafwenyo ni onego wajiure ne ber.

translation.en: We often regret decisions or actions we failed to take rather than those we take only to later realise we need to adjust for success.
translation.luo: Ng'enyne wayuago ang'e e paro kata timbe ma warem etimo moloyo mago ma watimo, bang'e wafwenyo ni onego wajiure ne ber.

translation.en: One of the best business decisions I ever made was about staff welfare.
translation.luo: Rieko maber ma aseng'ado en kuom duach jotich.

translation.en: With the current economic climate, many organisations have implemented hiring freezes.
translation.luo: Kaluore gi lwasi mar dak masani, kembe mang'eny oseruako ndiko jotij orak machuok.

translation.en: Kenyatta University is no different.
translation.luo: Mbalarieny ma Kenyatta ok opogore.

translation.en: My department had less than 50 per cent of the necessary manpower and that made for a dangerously understaffed department.
translation.luo: Migaona ne nigi ataa malo 50 mar jotich madwarore kendo mano ne oloso migao ma nigi jotich matin miwuoro.

translation.en: Therefore, I made the decision to document the state of the department and how we could not effectively continue to deliver services.
translation.luo: Ema omiyo, ne ang'ado rieko mar ndiko chal mar migao gi kaka ok wanyalo dhi nyime gi tich eyo makare.

translation.en: The comprehensive report put into focus how understaffed we were.
translation.luo: Tlupot ma ongirore ne menyo kaka ne wan gi jotich matin.

translation.en: As a result, the department was given additional staff members and things have definitely made a turnaround .
translation.luo: Kuom mano migao ne oyudo jotich manyien mosekelo lokruok.

translation.en: Delays in decision-making lead to a vacuum.
translation.luo: Lewo e ng'ado paro kelo thuolo.

translation.en: Delays and procrastination in decision-making is an open invitation for others to usurp your authority due to the vacuum you have created.
translation.luo: Lewo gi chwalo ng'ado rieko en luong ma oyawore ne jomoko mondo okau telo nikech thuolo miloso.

translation.en: It is far better to be decisive on a matter than to delay due to indecision.
translation.luo: Owinjore mondo ing'ad rieko moloyo lewo nikech ling.

translation.en: After all, no one can know every possible outcome of the decisions we make.
translation.luo: Kata kamano, onge ng'ato manyalo ng'eyo duoko moroamora ma wang'ado.

translation.en: The best we can do is to make the best decision with the information available.
translation.luo: Maber mawanyalo timo en ng'ado rieko maber gi weche mawan go.

translation.en: Dr Victor Mwongera is the non-executive chair of the Youth Enterprise Development Fund and head of Mechanical Engineering department at Kenyatta University.
translation.luo: Dr Victor Mwongera en jakom maok ongirore mar omenda mag dongruok mar yudhe( Youth Enterprise Development Fund) kendo jatelo e migao mar Mechanical Engineering  mar Kenyatta University.

translation.en: One decision I regret is when I once delegated a lot of responsibility to an officer which resulted in poor decisions that required months to correct.
translation.luo: Paro achiel mapod ayuago en mane apogo ting mang'eny ne apisa mane oyango ng'ado rieko e yoo maok nikare mane okawo dueche duoko e wang'e/loso.

translation.en: Correcting meant performing a crisis management and staff encouragement process.
translation.luo: Duoko e wang'e ne en timo geng'o lal kod yore jipo mar jotich.

translation.en: I have since learned that delegation is not always the magical solution to any problem.
translation.luo: Chakre kanyo aseng'eyo ni chiwo ting' ok en ga duoko maduong' mar chandruok mora amora.

translation.en: Delegate roles with clear job descriptions, expected outcomes and deliverables.
translation.luo: Chiwo tich gi ler madwarore, duoko migombo gi mongirore.

translation.en: I strongly believe in having a mentor, someone who has walked a similar journey with me.
translation.luo: Ayie ahinya e jajipo, ng'atno ma osewuotho e yoo achiel machal kod mara mondo owuoth koda.

translation.en: Therefore, even when I know I am doing the right thing, I still rely on my mentor when making a major decision to get an objective assessment of my thought process.
translation.luo: Ema omiyo, kata ang'eyo ni atimo gino maber,pod ayiengra kuom jajipo e seche ng'ado rieko mondo ayud chal makare e pacha.

translation.en: One of the best decisions I ever made was to transfer all our business platforms online over eight years ago, transforming the company into a digital marketing agency.
translation.luo: Achiel kuom riekni mane aseng'ado ne en loko kuonde wa mag ohala eyor mbui kuom higni aboro mosekalo, loko kambi bedo jakanyo e ohala mar mbui.

translation.en: When the pandemic hit, we were already in a good position for business continuity.
translation.luo: Kane midhiero ogoyowa, noseyudo kawan kama ber mar dhi nyime kod ohala.

translation.en: We successfully took part in the first virtual tourism expo where we were recognised by 53 countries and awarded among the Top 10 virtual event companies in 2020.
translation.luo: Nene watimo maber e ranyisi  mokuongo e yor mbui mar wuodh-aneno kama noyierwa gi pinje 53 kendo opuodhwa kaka jokanyo 10 mabeyo e ranyisi e yor mbui mag kembe e higa 2020.

translation.en: Procrastinate and lose the deal.
translation.luo: Chwal nyime mondo iyud lal.

translation.en: Before making an important decision, I meditate, pause and trust my intuition.
translation.luo: Kapok ang'ado rieko mochuno, aparo, ayueyo kendo ageno kuom pacha.

translation.en: If you are in authority, procrastinating in making a decision affects the company as well as the people around you.
translation.luo: Ponono in e telo, chualo nyime ng'ado paro, hinyo kambi kod joma oluori.

translation.en: You are in charge and must make some immediate and thorough decisions.
translation.luo: Intie e telo kendo ochuno ichiw paro maliw kendo mapiyo.

translation.en: At times, you cannot be diplomatic but downright straightforward because when opportunities come knocking and you fail to act fast, someone else may steal your tomorrow.
translation.luo: Kinde moko okinyal bedo mamuol, mana moriere nikech hawi nyalo biro mirem kawe piyo, ng'ato machielo nyalo kwale.

translation.en: With today’s cutthroat competition, you need to be on top of your game.
translation.luo: Gi chal mar piem kawuono, onego ibed ewi gik moko.

translation.en: I cannot point out a specific decision I regret but I make room where my team and I agree to disagree.
translation.luo: Ok anyal siemo rieko moro mane ang'ado ma ayuago makmana ni achiwo thuolo kama jimoko ma watiyogo koda an awuon wayiere kendo wanyalo tamre.

translation.en: This is a stepping stone towards growth and change.
translation.luo: Mae en ondamo e dongruok kod lokruok.

translation.en: Many are afraid to make decisions because they are worried about the outcome.
translation.luo: Jii mathoth oluoro ng'ado rieko nikech gin kod luoro ewi duoko.

translation.en: There is also a lack of confidence and self-esteem.
translation.luo: Kendo nitie koso chir kod nyadhi.

translation.en: They ponder over the question, ‘What if?’ Such insecurities may require one to seek advice or therapy to overcome.
translation.luo: Gisiko giparo e penjo,'Ponono?' Luoro kailago nyalo miyo ng'ato many rieko kata kata hocho e geng'o.

translation.en: French President Emmanuel Macron (centre) walks with Sudan's Sovereign Council Chief General Abdel Fattah al-Burhan and Sudan's Prime Minister Abdalla Hamdok before a joint news conference during the International Conference in support of Sudan at the Temporary Grand Palais in Paris.
translation.luo: Ker mar piny Farans Emmanuel Macron (diere) wuotho kod Ruoth Piny Sudan jeneral Abdel Fattah al-Burhan gi Prime Minister ma Sudan Abdalla Hamdok enyim romo mar jofwambo e romo mar piny ngima ma siro Sudan e kind matin mar Grand Palais epiny Paris.

translation.en: Sudan is seeking relief on more than $50 billion (Sh5.35 trillion) in external debt, with multilateral and bilateral creditors meeting in Paris in an effort to push the process forward.
translation.luo: Piny Sudan manyo kony mar omenda mokalo $50 billion (Sh5.35 trillion) e gowi ma gin go gi pinje maoko, eromo madhi nyime e piny Paris egombogi mar chwalo kwayono.

translation.en: Debt relief is a crucial step for Sudan, which sits in a volatile region between the Horn of Africa and North Africa, in its attempts to recover from a deep economic crisis and reenter the global economy after decades of isolation.
translation.luo: Kony mar chulo gowi en ondamo malich ne Sudan, mayudore kama ng'au ekind tung Afrika gi Nyanduat mar Afrika, ekinde motemo wuok e chandruok mag ridruok ngima kendo donjokendo e chal mar ngima mar piny ngima bang higni mang'eny mag chung kar kende.

translation.en: Sudan’s debt totals at least Sh5.35 trillion as of the end of 2019, according to the International Monetary Fund (IMF).
translation.luo: Gope Sudan kanyakla ok tinne omenda maromo trillion 5.35 e giko higa mar 2019, kaluore gi International Monetary Fund (IMF).

translation.en: The country is still working with its creditors to reconcile its debt up to the end of last year, and officials say the final total could be as high as $60 billion (Sh6.42 trillion).
translation.luo: Pinyno podi tiyo gi joholo e yore mag tieko gowi nyaka giko higa mokalo, kendo jotelo wacho ni kwan mogik nyalo bedo mang'eny kaka $60 billion (Sh6.42 trillion).

translation.en: According to the IMF, $5.6 billion (Sh600 billion) is owed to multilateral organisations including itself, the World Bank, and the African Development Bank (AfDB).
translation.luo: Kaluore gi IMF, gope maromo $5.6 billion (Sh600 billion) gin mag riuruoge mag pinje machalo, IMF owuon, World Bank gi African Development Bank (AfDB).

translation.en: An estimated $19 billion (Sh2.03 trillion) is owed to Paris Club creditors, of whom France, Austria, and the US are the largest.
translation.luo: Kwan moduaro romo gi omenda $19 billion (Sh2.03 trillion) en gowi mar jogowi mag Paris Club, ma pinje France, Austria kod Amerka ema dongoe.

translation.en: A similar amount is owed to non-Paris Club countries, including Kuwait, Sudan’s largest creditor at $9.8 billion (Sh1.04 trillion), Saudi Arabia and China.
translation.luo: Kwan machal en gowi mar maok en pinje Paris Club,kanyakla gi piny Kuwait,jagowi maduong, mar Sudan gi kwan maromo $9.8 billion (Sh1.04 trillion), Saudi Arabia kod China.

translation.en: Finally, Sudan holds what an IMF official says is an unusually high amount of debt to commercial lenders, estimated at almost $6 billion (Sh642 billion).
translation.luo: Mogik,Sudan nigi ma IMF wacho ni gowi maduong' malich ne johol omenda,kwan moduaro romo machieg'ni $6 billion (Sh642 billion).

translation.en: As Sudan was cut off from the international system for decades, about 85 per cent of its debt is arrears - unpaid interest and penalties.
translation.luo: Kane Sudan odir oko e chenro mar pinje kuom higni modhao, machieg'ni gi atamalo 85 mag gopene dong'-yuto mapok ochul kod fwai.

translation.en: After Sudan’s removal from the US state sponsors of terrorism list in late last year, it became eligible for the Highly Indebted Poor Countries programme, which provides debt relief for low-income nations.
translation.luo: Bang' golo oko Sudan e kwan mar pinje makonyo jonjore, gi piny Amerka e giko higa mokalo,ne oyiene bedo e chenro mag pinje manigi jowi mamalo kendo modhier machiwo kony ne pinje mayuto gi ni piny.

translation.en: ICT Cabinet Secretary Joe Mucheru during Telkom Kenya and Loon Technology launch
translation.luo: Jagoro maduong' e weche mag lony manyasani Joe Mucheru kinde yao kambi mar Telkom Kenya kod Loon Technology.

translation.en: Under the programme, all Sudan’s creditors will agree to restructure and forgive the debt.
translation.luo: Ebuo chenro no,joholo tee mag piny Sudan biro winjore kawo okang' manyien kod weyo gope.

translation.en: The government will waive licence fees for firms that set up community networks in underserved areas of the country to accelerate Internet connectivity.
translation.luo: Piny owacho biro nguono chudo mag otiko ne kembe machiwo yor fwambo e kor gwenge kuonde mopondo e piny mondo ochor nyime yore mag tudruok.

translation.en: This is according to a draft policy by the Communications Authority of Kenya (CA), that seeks to create a new licence category for community networks and develop financial and administrative requirements proportional to their scope and scale.
translation.luo: Mae en kaluwore gi ratiro mondiki gi bad migao matayo weche fuambo gi keyo (CAK), madwaro loso otiko manyien e kind anyuoala kendo gero dwaro weche omendo gi weche tayo apis maromre gi dwaro gi.

translation.en: “In reaching the unconnected segments of the population, many in remote or sparsely populated, low-income areas, there is recognition by the authority that a variety of complementary strategies are needed to meet the needs for affordable communications infrastructure,” says the CA.
translation.luo: “kochopo ne kidienje maokodudore e oganda,ngeny oganda e gwenge madhano tine, joma yuto gi tin,kama jotelo osefwenyo ni idwaro riekni mopogore mondo ochop dwaro ochop yot mar fwambo gi keyo.

translation.en: According to the draft, the rate of broadband connectivity is slowing down across the country, despite several firms deploying thousands of fibre optic cables in the past decade.
translation.luo: Kaluwore gi andika, atamalo mar yore tudruok dok piny ekor piny(broadband),kata bedni kembe mengeny keto weye mag fibre optic e higa apar mokalo.

translation.en: “In order to address rapidly rising demand, the authority is considering methods beyond the traditional model of commercial operator licensing and exclusive spectrum assignments,” the policy says.
translation.luo: Chik wacho ni, “Mondo wakony dwaro maidho malo mapiyo, telo rango yore mokalo machon mag ngado otiko mag ohala."

translation.en: According to the CA, 48 per cent of Kenyans, especially those living in rural areas, remain unconnected to mobile networks and an even larger number have no access to fixed broadband.
translation.luo: Kaluwore gi CA, atamalo 48 mag jo Kenya, ahinya modake kor gwenge,dong maok otudore gi ong'we yamo kata gi ji mangeny ok yud tudruok gi on'gweyamo ma ochung egwenge..

translation.en: As at last year, there were only four community networks in Kenya running pilot projects.
translation.luo: Higa mokalo, netie yor tudruok ang'wen kende manitemo e kenya.

translation.en: These were TunapandaNET in Cobra, Nairobi, Lanet Umoja in Nakuru, Dunia Moja in Kilifi and Aheri in Nyanza, all sponsored by non-governmental organisations.
translation.luo: Magi negin TunapandaNET e Cobra, Nairobi, Lanet Umoja ei Nakuru, Dunia Moja ei Kilifi and Aheri ei Nyanza, gitee neochungnegi migepe maok mag sirkalS.

translation.en: The networks utilise WiFi technology, leading to challenges of network congestion and signal interference.
translation.luo: Ong'we yamo tiyo gi yoo manyasani mar WiFi,manekelo lal mar yudo yore mag tudruok.

translation.en: High spectrum fees and regulatory demands on annual reporting further make it difficult for community networks without steady revenue streams.
translation.luo: Chudo mani malo kod dwaro mag chike e higa, kelo pek ne ongw'eyamo ekor gwenge maonge yore malong'o makelo yuto.

translation.en: A 15-year licence, for example, will cost a Tier-3 operator Sh200,000 initial operating fee, Sh5,000 licence application fee and annual operating fee of 0.4 per cent of annual gross turnover or Sh160,000, whichever is higher.
translation.luo: Otiko mar higni 15, kuom ranyisi, biro kao ja-ohola e okang mar 3 (tier-3) omenda maromo Sh 200,000 chudo mokuongo, sh 5000 mar ng'ado otiko gi ataamalo 0.4 mar yuto mar higa kata sh 160,000, moroamora man malo.

translation.en: Operators are also required to produce an annual compliance report and meet several other conditions, both to qualify and maintain the licence.
translation.luo: Johala bende iduaro mondo ochiu lupot mar luwo chik gi chopo chike moko mang'eny, mar romo gi rito otiko.

translation.en: Other barriers include the high cost of equipment linked to high import duty and custom fees on telecommunications equipment and user devices.
translation.luo: Ohinga mageng'o gikmoko gin kaka nengo ma malo mag gik moko motudore gi osuru mag chudo ma gik ma oa oko gi e tong' e gige fwambo moko miyogo.

translation.en: Under the new proposal, operators deploying within a sub-county will only pay Sh1,000 in licence application fees, Sh5,000 in initial operating licence fees and Sh5,000 in annual operating fees for a 10-year licence.
translation.luo: E buo paro manyien, jo ohand tudruok matiyo e sub kanti biro mana chulo sh 1000 mar ng'ado otiko, sh 5000 mar otiko mokuongo gi Sh 5000 e higa kuom otiko mar higa 10.

translation.en: At the same time, fibre-optic network operators will be required to publish a standard price list that is transparent and non-discriminative for wholesale rates that will be charged to community network providers.
translation.luo: Eseche gogo, jofwambo gi keyo mar fibre-optic ibiro dwar mondo ondik ayanga nengo makare  maler kendo maonge pogo, ne duke madongo ma ibiro usi ne jo ohala mantiere e gweng.

translation.en: CA also hopes the policy will help create impetus for prospective service providers to make commercial use of television white spaces, the spectrum freed up by the country’s migration from analogue to digital broadcasting.
translation.luo: CA bende gombo ni chikego biro kelo achune ne jok madigomb tiyo kod gige ohala mag fwambo mar televison white space, e thuolo mar korlwasi mochiuw gi dar mar piny koa e lendo manyachon nyaka manyasani.

translation.en: The authority says it will set up a regulatory sandbox where spectrum fees will be waived for service providers that will be invited to test technologies that can use TV white spaces.
translation.luo: Telono wacho ni gibiro keto chike mag sandbox mabiro duoko chien chudo mar fwambo e korlwasi, ne jo ohala ma ibiro luongi e temo lony manyalo tiyo gi tv white space.

translation.en: The ongoing construction of Lanet Airport at 81 Tank Battalion Barracks-Lanet in Nakuru County.
translation.luo: Gedo madhi nyime e pau ndege ma Lanet e  kambi jolweny mar 81 Tank Battalion  mantiere Nakuru Kanti.

translation.en: Lanet Airport will be completed by August next year, Kenya Airports Authority (KAA) has said.
translation.luo: Duol mar Kenya Airports Authority ne owacho ni pau ndege ma Lanet ibiro tieki rom due mar aboro higa manyien.

translation.en: In a statement, the authority said the first phase of the Sh3 billion project was on course amid the Covid-19 pandemic, which has affected many development projects.
translation.luo: E andike, telo wachoni ondamo mokuongo mar dongruok mar omenda maromo billion 3  ne dhi nyime ekind midhiero mar covid-19 moserocho dongruok mang'eny.

translation.en: “The groundbreaking for the project was done in December 2020, the site handed over to the contractor in January 2021 and the project commenced on February 23. The contract period is 18 months and the completion date set on August 22, 2021,” said KAA.
translation.luo: “Puotho mar dongruokno ne otim Desemba 2020. kendo tich ne omi jaorak Januar 2021 kendo dongruok ne ochakore Februar tarik 23. Ndalo mag timo orak en dueche 18, kendo rumone ochan e due mar aboro tark 22, 2021," KAA neowacho.

translation.en: The project entails the upgrade of a 1.7-kilometre-long military runway at 81 Tank Battalion Barracks, Lanet, which is currently of gravel finish to bitumen standards.
translation.luo: Dongruokno onywando medo goyo lam ndach ndege maromo kilomita 1.7 e kambi jolweny mar 81 Tank Battalion ma Lanet, masani obugi.

translation.en: The airbase will be a dual military-civilian facility.
translation.luo: Kar jodno biro bedo yore ariyo mar jotij lweny.

translation.en: The runway strip will be 150 metres wide with four taxiways and a military apron that will be able to accommodate larger and heavier commercial aircrafts such as Beechcraft 1900.
translation.luo: Ndara mar ndege biro yarore maromo mita 150 gi yore ang'wen mag nyambruko gi mag rwako jolweny mabiro romo ndeke madongo kendo mapek kaka Beechcraft 1900.

translation.en: During an inspection tour on Tuesday by Nakuru Governor Lee Kinyanjui, accompanied by Bahati MP Kimani Ngunjiri, KAA revealed that the Sh400 million first phase of the project was 5 per cent complete.
translation.luo: Ekind wuoth mar nono, chieng' tich ariyo gi Gabana ma Nakuru Lee Kinyanjui, kokowe gi jaod bura ma Bahati Kimani Ngunjiri, KAA ne oyudo ni ondamo mokuongo mar dongruok mar omenda maromo milion 400 ne oserumo gi atamalo 5.

translation.en: “The government has allocated Sh406,761,591 for the first phase. An advance payment of Sh39,418,827 has been made. The project is currently at 5.5 per cent. The contractor has mobilized the required resources including human capital,” KAA said in a statement.
translation.luo: “Piny owacho osechiwo omenda maro milion 406,761,591 e ondamo mokuongo. Chudo motelo mar milion39,418,827 osetim. Gisani dongruok nitiere e atamalo 5.5. Jaorak osemanyo gik madwarore kanyakla gi jotich," KAA neowacho e andika.

translation.en: Government spokesman Cyrus Oguna led the County Development Implementation Coordination Committee (CDICC) in an inspection tour of the project.
translation.luo: Jawach elo Sirkal Cyrus Oguna ne otayo duol mar kanti mar County Development Implementation Coordination Committee (CDICC) e wuoth mar nono dongruokgo.

translation.en: Due to limited civilian access to the project site within the military facility, speculation has been rife that the project was yet to take off.
translation.luo: Kaluwore gi thuolo matin mar jopiny donjo e kar dongruok mar jolweny, malingling wachoni dongruokno pokne ochakre.

translation.en: “There have been questions over the progress of this project and we assure the residents that everything is on track. The contractor has devised ways to continue undertaking it safely in regards to Covid-19,” said Kinyanjui.
translation.luo: “Penjo mang'eny osebedo ewi dongruogni kendo wachiko jopiny ni gik moko duto nikare. Ja orak oseyudo yore mabeyo mag dhi nyime gi dongruok kaluwore gi chike mag covid-19,” Kinyanjui ne owacho.

translation.en: The governor noted that the project has a high potential for taxpayers as they will recoup funds invested in the project through the tourism and horticultural sub-sectors which thrive in the county.
translation.luo: Gabana no ne omedo ni dongruogni nigi nyalo ma malo ne jochul osuru nikechi gibiro yudo omenda moseket e dongruogno kokalo kum sekta matindo mag wuodh aneno gi pur mar olembe e kanti.

translation.en: “This dream was conceived over 20 years ago and for the first time, we have seen a commitment by the government in financial allocation and implementation. The investment shall not be in vain considering the potential of our county and the Rift region,” said Kinyanjui.
translation.luo: “Maye en lek mane opar higni 20 mosekalo kendo mokuongo tik, waseneno chiuruok moa kuom piny owacho eyor chiwo omenda gi tim. Keto mwanduni ok biro dhi nono kaluwore gi kanyalo mar kanti wa gi gwenge mayudore e holo mar okak,”  Kinyanjui neowacho.

translation.en: Residents around the barracks are set to benefit from the project which is set to have tarmac roads leading to the airport for easier access.
translation.luo: Jodak aluora mar kambi jolweny biro yudo konyruok mayot mar ndach lam madhi e pau ndege.

translation.en: They each contributed Sh500 every week from the menial jobs they did
translation.luo: Gite negigolo Sh500 juma ka juma koa e tijegi matindo.

translation.en: After completing their studies at the university, seven graduates from Ebubole village in Mumias East Central Sub County, Kakamega County found themselves in a tight corner.
translation.luo: Bang tieko sombgi e mbalariany, jotieko 7 moa e gweng mar Ebubole mayudore sab kanti ma Mumias ma yimbo ma diere, Kakamega kanti, ne oyudore kama tek.

translation.en: Tired of being seen as a burden by their family, they combined forces and formed Terry Agri-centre, a self-help group and started table banking in 2018.
translation.luo: Ne giol bedo ting ne anyuolagi kendo ne giriwo paro mi gichako Terry Agri-centre, maen bura mar kungo gi holo mane ochakore 2018.

translation.en: Others are Josephine Wanzala, Isaac Lumbasi and Wycliffe Lubale.
translation.luo: Moko gin Josephine Wanzala, Isaac Lumbasi gi Wycliffe Lubale.

translation.en: The seven friends include James Ndege,  a graduate from Kenyatta University in Dryland Agriculture and Enterprise Development, Nicholas Ambembe with a degree in General Agriculture from Egerton University, Rose Okello with a degree in Statistics and Programming and Penninah Ocholla with a degree in Finance.
translation.luo: Osiepe abiryo go gin James Ndege,  jatieko ma Kenyatta University gi lony e Dryland Agriculture and Enterprise Development, Nicholas Ambembe gi lony e General Agriculture kaoa Egerton University, Rose Okello  gi lony e Statistics and Programming kod Penninah Ocholla gi lony e Finance.

translation.en: To start off, they each contributed Sh500 every week from the menial jobs they did and after 10 months, they had saved a total of Sh140, 000.
translation.luo: E chakne, ng'ato ka ng'ato ng'ato nogolo siling 500 juma ka juma koya kuom tijegi matindotindo manegitimo kaeto bang' dweche 10, negisekano omenda maromo siling 140, 000.

translation.en: Luckily, along the way Rose, Nicholas and Penninah secured well-paying jobs and used their payslips to secure a loan of Sh250, 000 each totalling to Sh750, 000.
translation.luo: Hawi maber, ekindego Rose, Nicholas and Penninah noyudo tije machudogi ber kendo negitiyo gi obokgi mag chudo yudo hola mar siling 250,000 ng'ato ka ng'ato ma duto romo siling 750, 000.

translation.en: “We used the money to buy two pieces of land in Kakamega Central and Mumias East at a cost of Sh500, 000 and Sh350, 000 respectively. The plots were half an acre each. After securing the plots, we decided to try a hand in poultry farming as we shared a common passion in the same,” says Ndege.
translation.luo: “Newatiyogi omendago e nyiewo opande ariyo mag lowo e Kakamega madieri kod  Mumias ma ugue e nengo mar siling 500, 000 kod siling 350, 000 e luruogno. Plode go ne nus mar heka moro ka moro. Bang' kawo plode go, newaparo temo lwetwa e pith winy kaka osebedo ka gombo wa oriworee,” Ndege wacho.

translation.en: Although they were from different areas, Ndege says they made sure that they had a get-together meeting every weekend to strategise.
translation.luo: Kata kamano negiwuok kuonde mopogre opogre,Ndege wacho ni negi temo matek bedo gi bura, kanykla giko wik ka giko wik, mar pango weche kod ng'ado paro.

translation.en: They agreed to start a joint poultry project in January 2019.
translation.luo: Negiyie chako dongruok mar pith winy e dwei mar Januar 2019.

translation.en: Ndege, who now manages the project given his rich background in agriculture, says they put up a makeshift structure in Ebubole village in Mumias East where they had bought one of the plots and started with 250-improved Kienyeji chicken that was two weeks old.
translation.luo: Ndege, ma sani tayo dongruogno kaluwore gi lonyne maber e pith, wachoni negiketo ranyisi e gweng mar Ebubole mantie Mumias ma ugue kama negi nyiewoe achiel kuom plodegi kendo negichako kod kwan 250-gwend nyiluo manyasani mane nigi wige ariyo.

translation.en: “We bought the chicks from Engokho poultry farm in Bungoma at a cost of Sh150 per chick totalling to Sh37, 500. After three months, we sold them to leading hotels in Kakamega and Mumias towns at a cost of Sh450 each and got Sh112, 500,” explains Ndege.
translation.luo: “Neginyiewo nyi gwen koya e puoth pith mar Engokho  mayudore Bungoma e nengo mar siling 150 e nyagweno ka nyagweno maduto romo siling37, 500. Bang dweche adek, newausogi e magawa moko madongo mayudore e bombe mag Kakamega kod e nengo mar siling 450 achiel kuom achiel kendo newayudo siling Sh112, 500," Ndege lero.

translation.en: According to Ndege, they used the money to buy 1,000-day-old chicks at Sh100 each and the balance used to buy feeds. The birds were all layers.
translation.luo: Kaluwore gi Ndege, negitiyo kod omenda e nyiewo nyigwen man gi ndalo 1,000 mag siling 100 kuom achiel kendo balang nonyiew godo chiembgi. Winy go tee nenyuolo tong.

translation.en: They also took part of their savings and bought additional 500-day-old chicks and this one they kept specifically for meat.
translation.luo: Kendo negikawo padh kungo gi kendo negi medo nyiewo nyigwen man gi ndalo 500 mane gipidho ahinya ahinya mag chiemo.

translation.en: They sold most of the birds for events like weddings, funerals and birthday parties, though this attracted low-profit margins.
translation.luo: Winj go negiuso ahinya e nyasi kaka arus,liete kod nyasi mag bago chieng' par nyuol, kata kamano yuto gi ne ni piny.

translation.en: First tough months
translation.luo: Dweche matek mokuongo.

translation.en: To boost the survival of the birds, they follow a strict vaccination schedule.
translation.luo: E jiwo dak mag winy, negiluwo adimba chenro mar chenjo.

translation.en: “On day one, we gave the chicks Marex vaccine and at seven days old, we administered gumboro vaccine and on day 14 we gave them the Newcastle vaccine. At three weeks we repeated Gumboro and then Newcastle vaccine at week four,” says Ndege.
translation.luo: “Chieng' moro achiel, newamiyo nyigwen chanjo mar Marex kendo odiochieng' mar abiryo, newachiwo chanjo mar gumboro bange odiochieng' mar 14 newachiwo negi tee chanjo mar Newcastle. Chop wige adek newanuyo chanjo mag Gumboro kod Newcastle e wik mar ang'wen," Ndege wacho.

translation.en: “The first five months is not a walk in the park. You spend from your pocket. Our savings were almost drying up but when they started hatching eggs, we got relief as we used part of the money to buy feeds”.
translation.luo: “Dweche abich mokuongo onge yot. Itiyo mana gi ofuki. Keno wa nechiegni rumo kata kamano ,mane gichako kuanyo tong, newayudo yueyo nikech newatiyo kod padh yuto e nyiewo chiemo”.

translation.en: For the first seven days, they fed the chicks on starter mash and changed to chick mash then to growers mash when they were two months.
translation.luo: E odiochienge abiryo mokuongo, negimiyo nyigwen chiemb puonjruok chiemo bange loko chiemb nyigwen maya kae to chiemb nyigwen madito kane giromo dweche ariyo.

translation.en: They changed to layers mash when they started seeing the first eggs in September 2019.
translation.luo: Negiloko chiemb jiwo toko kane gichako neno tonge mokuongo e dwe Septemba 2019.

translation.en: “We would collect between 700 and 820 eggs daily totalling about 19,200 eggs a month. We would hatch three-quarters of the eggs and the balance we sold it to the locals at Sh25 each since they were fertilised eggs,” says Ndege.
translation.luo: “Ne wanyalo kuanyo e kind tonge 700 kod 820 pile mariwore machieg'ni tonge 19,200 e dwe. Ne wanyalo toyo achiel e adek mag tonge kendo uso balang ne jogweng e siling 25 kuom achiel nikech ne gin tonge momiyo,” Ndege wacho.

translation.en: Terry Agri Centre now has almost 4,000 birds in different stages.
translation.luo: Terry Agri Centre sani nikod machieg'ni gi winy  4,000 e kidieny mopogre.

translation.en: When Covid-19 pandemic struck, hotels were closed and the government applied breaks on events like weddings and birthday parties as well as restricting the number of people who should attend funerals.
translation.luo: Kane midhiero mar Covid-19 ochopo, magawa nolor kendo piny owacho noketo chung e nyasi kaka arus kod nyasi mag paro odiochieng nyuol kanyakla gi geng'o kwan mag jii monego chop e liete.

translation.en: According to Isaac Lumbasi, to remain afloat, they went back to the drawing board and started using social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp and Instagram to market their products.
translation.luo: Kaluore kod Isaac Lumbasi, mondo gibed kanyo, negi dhi e paro matut magi chako tiyo gi yore mbui kaka Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp kod Instagram e uso keyo gi.

translation.en: Lumbasi says they also had to change tactic and ventured big time into the chick hatching business.
translation.luo: Lumbasi wacho ni nochuno gilok yorgi kendo negikawo seche gi tee magiketo e ohala mar uso nyigwen.

translation.en: “It’s expensive to rear chicken until maturity and yet there is no market. During the pandemic, we discovered that chick hatching was a lucrative business. We have three incubators with a hatching capacity of 528 eggs meaning every month, we hatch more than 1,500 chicks,” said Lumbasi.
translation.luo: “En nengo matek pidho nyigwen nyaka gi dongi aeto ok iyu chiro.Ekinde mag midhiero, ne wafwenyo ni ohand to tong' ne ber. Wan gi masinde adek ma moro ka moro nyalo toyo tong' 528 due ka due, watoo nyigwen mokalo 1,500,” Lumbasi neowacho.

translation.en: On value addition, Lumbasi says they also started slaughtering the birds and sell it to the locals in pieces.
translation.luo: E medo ndhadhu, Lumbasi wacho ni kendo negichako nyang'o gwen kendo uso ne jii e aluora.

translation.en: Wycliffe Lubale says they also grow sukuma wiki, Amaranth, Nightshade and pumpkins, which they feed on the birds and sell it to the locals.
translation.luo: Wycliffe Lubale wacho ni gi pidho alod sukuma wiki, Ododo, Osuga gi budho, magimiyo gwen kendo gi uso ne jii e aluora.

translation.en: The team has stationed their headquarters in Kakamega and also offer extension services to farmers in Bungoma, Kakamega, Vihiga and Busia counties.
translation.luo: Nyoriwoni ne oketo apisgi maduong' Kakamega kendo gi chiwo puonj malach ne jopur e kantis ma Bungoma, Kakamega, Vihiga gi Busia.

translation.en: So far, the biggest challenge they face is the high cost of feeds and electricity especially for the hatching of chicks.
translation.luo: Gi sani, Pek magi yudo en nengo ma malo mar chiemo gi teko stima moloyo e to tong'.

translation.en: The government is keen on concluding negotiations for the free trade agreement with the United States, President Uhuru Kenyatta said on Tuesday.
translation.luo: Piny owacho ochikore tir e winjruok mar ayie mar loko ohala maonge rochruok/ageng'a gi piny mar Amerka, Ker Uhuru ne owacho chieng' tich ariyo.

translation.en: Talks on free trade agreements began in 2018 following a meeting between President Uhuru and former US President Donald Trump.
translation.luo: Wuoyo ewi ayie mar ohala maonge rochruok neochako 2018 kaluwore gi romo maeobet e kind Kre Uhuru gi Ker machon mar Amerka Donald Trump.

translation.en: However, it was not until July 8 last year that both countries announced the formal launch of talks, with July 31 this year set as the deadline for putting pen to paper on the deal.
translation.luo: Kata kamano, tarik 8 Due mar abiryo higa mokalo ema ne pinje ariyogo ne okuongo lando yango winjruogni, kendo tarik 31 due mar abiryo higani ema ne oyier mar geto sei e winjruok.

translation.en: In April this year, US Trade Representative Amb Katherine Tai said further negotiations have to align to President Joe Biden’s Build Back Better Agenda, which could further delay the agreement.
translation.luo: Due mar ang'wen higani, Ambasada ma amerka Katherine Tai ne omedo wachoni winjruogno onego riere tiir gi agenda mar Ker Joe Biden mar Build Back Better, manyalo lewo ayie.

translation.en: While underscoring the importance of the private sector in Kenya's economic growth and job creation, President Uhuru Kenyatta said Kenya is keen on concluding negotiations for the free trade agreement with the US.
translation.luo: Kane ojiwo ber mar sekta mag jii giwegi e dongruog ngima e Kenya gi yore mag kelo tije, Ker Uhuru Kenyatta neowacho ni piny Kenya ochikore tiir gi tieko ayie mar winjruok mag ohala maonge rochruok gi US.

translation.en: He said more partnerships between Kenyan and American Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) will help unlock the huge trade potential that exists between the two nations.
translation.luo: Ne owachoni riurwok mang'eny kind ohendni matindo gi madiere ( Small and Medium Enterpriese (SMEs) ekind Kenya gi Amerka biro konyo e yawo ohala madongo mayudore e kind pinje ariyogo.

translation.en: The President invited American SMEs to invest more in the country by entering into mutually beneficial arrangements with their Kenyan counterparts, adding that the enterprises are the backbone of Kenya's vibrant economy.
translation.luo: Ker ne orwako ohendni matindo (SMEs)  mondo obi otim ohala e pinywa kagi donjore ewinjruok mag ohala makonyo pinje ariyogo, komedo ni ohala e misingi mar dongruok mag dak epinyka.

translation.en: “This is where the real opportunity lies. This is not to say that we are telling the big boys not to come in, they are already here. The big corporates are already here.”
translation.luo: “Kae ema thuolo makende yudore. Mae ok en wacho ni wanyiso jogogo madongo mondo kik chopi,negisetundo kodwa kae. Ohendni madongo nosetundo kae.”

translation.en: “But they don’t have the capacity to propel inclusive growth as the small and medium enterprises that have a much greater capacity of affecting lives and changing the livelihoods at the grassroots level,” he said.
translation.luo: “Kata kamano gi onge kod romo mar kaso dongruok ma oriwo ohendni matindo mantie kod romo mamalo mar loko ngima kod dak e okang mapiny e pon,” ne owacho.

translation.en: He spoke during a virtual US Chamber of Commerce Global Leaders’ Forum on Economic Recovery.
translation.luo: Ne owuoyo e diere romo e yor yamo, mar ohala mar jotelo mapiny ngima e bade mar Amerka, e wi duoko kare ngima mar dak.

translation.en: He invited American enterprises to set shop in Kenya saying the country provides a ready market for US products, and has an expanding economy supported by an innovative and highly skilled young labour force that is ready to absorb American investments and technology.
translation.luo: Ne oguelo ohendgi ma pinj Amerka e keto duka e piny Kenya, ka owacho ni piny chiwo chiro mapiyo ne mwandu moya Amerka, kendo yawruok e chal dak ka osir kod ng'eyo kod rieko man malo mag jotich ma hike gi tindo ma oikore kawo mwandu moya Amerka kod yore go manyasani.

translation.en: “I believe this is a mutually beneficial relationship that offers investment opportunities with great returns for American companies while at the same time offering job opportunities to Kenyans,” the President said.
translation.luo: “Ageno ni mae en konyruok wa watee e riuruok machiwo thuolo mar keto mwandu mantie kod nuengo madongo ne kembe mag Amerka e seche magi chiwo thuolo mag orak ne jokenya,” ker nowacho.

translation.en: On the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA), he said the multilateral trade arrangement had consolidated Africa's market of over one billion people into one basket making the continent an attractive investment destination for American businesses.
translation.luo: E wi kuonde mag ohala maonge pogruok e piny Afrika (AfCFTA), ne owachoni chenro mar ohand riwruok mag pinje noriwo chich Afrika ma oingo oganda tara achiel ei atonga achiel maketo piny Afrika kende e dhadhu mar keto mwandu ne ohendgi mag piny Amerika.

translation.en: Conceptualised in 2012, AfCFTA officially kicked off last January 1, with the 55 member states expected to begin trading under the agreement.
translation.luo: Keto e tim e higa 2012, AfCFTA ne ochakre ayanga dwe Januar 1 mokalo, kod pinje 55 ogen chako ohala ebuo winjruok.

translation.en: According to a new World Bank study, AfCFTA could also help lift 4.4 million Kenyans out of poverty, with the country emerging among the top beneficiaries of the ambitious trade pact.
translation.luo: Kaluore gi nonro manyien mar bengi maduong e piny ngima, AfCFTA nyalo ting'o malo jokenya  gana 4.4  kowuok e dhier, e seche ma piny wuok e jogo mayudo kony mamalo koya kuom gombo mar andike mar ohala.

translation.en: “Under the AfCFTA scenario, real income would increase by seven per cent by 2035, relative to the baseline for the Africa region - a sizable gain,” senior World Bank economists Caroline Freund and Albert Zeufack said in the study.
translation.luo: “Ebuo tipo mar AfCFTA , yuto makende nyalo medore kod atamalo abiryo erom higa 2035, kopim gi ratil ma aluora Afrika - yuto maduong' moromo,” Jokungo madongo mag bengi maduong e piny ng'ima Caroline Freund kod Albert Zeufack nowacho e nonro.

translation.en: In monetary terms, the gains represent around $445 billion (Sh45 trillion) in Africa by 2035, while the rest of the world is expected to record an increase of $76 billion (Sh7.6 trillion) in real income.
translation.luo: E yor omenda, yuto ochung'ne machieg'ni gi siling Billion $444 (Sh45 trillion) e Afrika erom higa 2035, ka pinje mamoko igeno ni ondik meto mar siling Billion $76  (Sh7.6 trillion) mag yuto makende.

translation.en: “The gains are unevenly distributed across the Africa region,” explains the study.
translation.luo: “Yuto okere mopogre opogre e kor lele Afrika,” nonro lero.

translation.en: “At the very high end are Côte d’Ivoire with gains of 13 per cent and Zimbabwe with gains of 12 per cent, followed by Kenya, Namibia, Democratic Republic of Congo and Tanzania at more than 10 per cent.”
translation.luo: “Malo mogik tung' nigi Côte d’Ivoire kod yuto atamalo 13 kod Zimbabwe gi atamalo 12 , kiluwe gi Kenya, Namibia, Democratic Republic of Congo kod Tanzania gi moingo atamalo 10.”

translation.en: Imagine you are a consultant in the organisational behaviour space and you have been hired by a corporate to fix what has been described to you as a “broken HR system”.
translation.luo: Pare ni in ja ng'ad rieko e lwasi manitie kit duol kendo oluongi kod kambi mondo iduok e wang'e gima nosedendni kaka kethruok riuruog jotich (broken HR system).

translation.en: The firm has been struggling with a high staff turnover with many employees barely lasting two years.
translation.luo: Kmbi osebedo kachandore kod kwan jotich mang'eny ka tin jotich mang'eny tiyo kuom higni ariyo.

translation.en: An audit of the departing employees shows that they were making lateral moves.
translation.luo: E puoth, jo tiye orak mawuok nyiso ni negin jowuok e kinde molewo.

translation.en: Internal retention panels and taskforces had come up with what was believed to be innovative incentives to retain employees but even with these, the needle barely moved.
translation.luo: Duol ma iye matayo yore orak kendo winjruok mag jotich, nochuno ma obiro paro mar jiwo jotich mondo kik kidhiyo,gi mago pachgi oknodhi kare.

translation.en: The CEO and HR honcho concluded that maybe the involvement of an impartial, detached outsider would not only help diagnose but also fix the malaise.
translation.luo: Apisa maduong kod jachiw orak nowacho ni sechemoko nywando jawasigu, ng'atno maok otudre kod kambi, ok biro konyo kende nono kendo obiro loso achiedhnadi.

translation.en: Pre-engagement review of documents from the client suggests that everyone is taking this problem seriously.
translation.luo: Rang'o mokuongo obok mag jauso nyiso ni ng'ato ka ng'ato okawo chandruogni matek.

translation.en: Management has initiated talent retention bonuses for star performers. There is an elaborate coaching and career guidance programme in place.
translation.luo: Telo osechako chiwo mag pok ne jotich ma otiyo kaka dwarore. Nitiere puonj moyangi kod pengo gi techo e weche mag tich.

translation.en: The organisation has a powerful mission to solve societal problems, something that should appeal to young, ambitious employees.
translation.luo: Kambi ni kod lek ahinya mar loyo chandruog anyuola, gima onego bed ranyisi maber ne joma tindo, kod jotich mabeyo.

translation.en: So why are employees not staying?
translation.luo: Ang'o ma omiyo jotich ok budhi?

translation.en: This is so puzzling that you decide to consult an old colleague, a veteran who also teaches at a local university.
translation.luo: Mae kelo kiawa momiyo ochako dayo jatichgi machon, ma en jalony kendo japuonj e mbalarieny ma ongere.

translation.en: You send a brief of your understanding of the problem to help her appreciate the challenge.
translation.luo: Iorne winjoni matin kaluore kod chandruogno mondo okonye e puoyo pekno.
